settings.title: Create your seller Account
settings.content:
The first time you request to list an item with us at Found Fashion, you will need to create a seller profile. This will enable you to view your listed items once they are approved, delist them if you no longer want to sell and to set up your payment method.

Once a customer purchases your item, you will have 24 hours to approve or decline the sale. Once approved, we will send you a shipping label for our head office. We will authenticate the item and then send to the buyer. Payment will be made to your account once we have authenticated the item and shipped to the buyer.

settings.title: LIST YOUR PRODUCT
settings.content: Fill in the form below for each item. Once our team have approved the product we will automatically add it to your seller profile. Please use a plain background for all pictures and videos.
settings.link_text: Click Here To List An Item
